meanings.definition: Extreme greed for wealth or material gain.
meanings.sent1: His avariciousnesses knew no bounds as he hoarded every penny he earned.
meanings.sent2: The avariciousnesses of the businessman led him to exploit his workers for more profit.
meanings.sent3: The avariciousnesses of the squirrel became evident when it tried to hoard all the nuts in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her avariciousnesses were like a black hole, constantly consuming everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The avariciousnesses of the dragon were so intense that it guarded its treasure with fierce determination.

meanings.sent1: The avariciousnesses of the CEO were evident in his constant pursuit of wealth.
meanings.sent2: She displayed a remarkable avariciousnesses that drove her to always seek more.
meanings.sent3: The avariciousnesses of the cat were comical as it tried to steal treats from the other pets.
meanings.sent4: His avariciousnesses shone through in his eyes, always looking for the next opportunity to gain more.
meanings.sent5: The avariciousnesses of the queen bee made her the wealthiest insect in the hive.
